thread.title: David P.
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by David P.

author: David P.
title: David P.
text: Kevin and support staff at RGB are terrific! For me, taxes are a bit nerve racking but its always a relief after see Kevin. He's always has the answers and has helped me out of problems in the past. He is smart, polite, professional and he takes time to explain things to you.
